emergencyTypes.description: Intense, throbbing pain that interferes with daily activities
emergencyTypes.treatment: Pain relief, antibiotics, root canal if needed

emergencyTypes.description: Complete tooth displacement due to trauma or accident
emergencyTypes.treatment: Tooth reimplantation if possible, or immediate replacement options

emergencyTypes.description: Fractured tooth causing pain or sharp edges
Dental restoration has fallen out, exposing sensitive tooth

emergencyTypes.treatment: Drainage, antibiotics, root canal or extraction

steps: Rinse mouth with warm salt water
Apply cold compress to outside of cheek
Handle tooth by crown, not root
Try to reinsert in socket if possible
If not possible, store in milk or saliva
